=========================
zgeo.wfs Package Readme
=========================

Overview
--------

zgeo.wfs allows to handles WFS request according the OGC specifications:
http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/wfs


More details in geoitem.txt and webfeatureservice.txt 


Install
-------

First, install:
- spatialindex (>=1.3): see http://trac.gispython.org/spatialindex/wiki
- libgeos

Then, add zgeo.wfs in your buildout eggs section.
